title: Mets Stars Ruben Tejada and Justin Turner Headline 'YMCA Jr. Mets Supported By Citi' Program at Marconi Park In Jamaica, Queens
summary: Flushing, N.Y. - The New York Mets and Citi held a special YMCA Jr. Mets event at Marconi Park in Jamaica, Queens, featuring Mets stars Ruben Tejada and Justin Turner addressing and instructing kids from the local Jamaica YMCA. The project is part of the Mets and Citi's "Teammates in the Community" initiative, reflecting their ongoing commitment to being active participants in the community.
tag-1: Mets Stars Ruben Tejada and Justin Turner Headline 'YMCA Jr. Mets Supported By Citi' Program at Marconi Park In Jamaica, Queens
tag-3: Flushing, N.Y. – The New York Mets and Citi held a special YMCA Jr. Mets event at Marconi Park in Jamaica, Queens, featuring Mets stars Ruben Tejada and Justin Turner addressing and instructing kids from the local Jamaica YMCA. The project is part of the Mets and Citi's "Teammates in the Community" initiative, reflecting their ongoing commitment to being active participants in the community.
tag-4: The YMCA Jr. Mets supported by Citi, operated by the YMCA of Greater New York in collaboration with the Mets and Citi, is a comprehensive eight-week youth baseball program that emphasizes the fun of playing baseball while also developing athletic and social skills, and practicing the YMCA's core values of respect, responsibility, honesty and caring. The program aims to build feelings of competence and confidence in youth to enhance their self-esteem. Good sportsmanship, teamwork and fair play are themes around which all practices and games are conducted.
tag-5: "Citi is thrilled to partner with the Mets and the YMCA of Greater New York on YMCA Jr. Mets as it is an integral part of our youth community sports platform in the tri-state region," said Rei Perez, Vice President, Citi Community Development. "Our involvement with this great program enables us to expand our reach and share our mentoring and education events to even more of the future leaders of tomorrow in an engaging and fun way, through the great game of baseball. We'd like to thank Ruben and Justin for joining us today and to our partners at the Mets and the YMCA. Together, we are proud to make a profound difference in the community."
tag-6: "We have been proud supporters of the YMCA Jr. Mets program since 2001, and partnering with Citi allows this important initiative to have a greater impact on the community," said Dave Howard, Executive Vice President, Business Operations, Mets. v
tag-7: Additionally, the Mets and Citi presented YMCA of Greater New York volunteer Paul J. Pullo with the "Teammates in the Community Award" during a special pre-game ceremony before the Mets took on the Colorado Rockies at Citi Field. The award recognizes individuals who have demonstrated extraordinary ways to give back to the community, and Pullo, an avid Mets fan, was honored for his exemplary commitment and dedication to serving and helping others. He is the board chair of the Greenpoint Y, and his concern for children has always been a priority.
tag-8: "The Jr. Mets program is a great way for YMCA kids to not only learn the fundamentals of baseball, but to learn what it's like to win, lose and play the game," said Gary Laermer, chief development officer of the YMCA of Greater New York. "We are honored that Paul Pullo from the Greenpoint Y will receive the 'Teammates in the Community Award.' Paul is a vital and dedicated member of the YMCA team and family."
tag-9: The YMCA Jr. Mets supported by Citi has engaged over 900 boys and girls over an eight-week period this summer to learn about baseball, teamwork and healthy lifestyles. Last month, participating children ages 5-14 were taught the rules of the game and practiced offensive and defensive skills. Now the kids are in the midst of competing in games and every participant gets to be on a team and play, regardless of individual ability.
tag-10: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
tag-11: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://blog.citigroup.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi
tag-12: YMCA of Greater New York  The YMCA of Greater New York is, and always will be, dedicated to building healthy, confident, connected and secure children, adults, families and communities. With a focus on youth development, healthy living and social responsibility, the Y nurtures the potential of every youth and teen, improves New York City's health and well-being and provides opportunities to give back and support neighbors. In scores of neighborhoods across the five boroughs and its camp upstate, the Y makes accessible the support and opportunities that empower more than 400,000 New Yorkers to learn, grow and thrive. Visit ymcanyc.org.
